resources.string: Permission permanently denied. You can go to application settings to enable them.
Provide fine location access for better functionality.
This app needs location permission so that you can stream media in your vicinity.
It seems you\'ve permanently declined location permission. You can go to the app settings to grant it.
This app needs access to your microphone so that you can record audio stories you want to share.
It seems you\'ve permanently declined microphone permission. You can go to the app settings to grant it.
This app needs access to your camera and microphone so that you can capture media you want to share.
It seems you\'ve permanently declined camera permission. You can go to the app settings to grant it.
This app needs access to your storage so that you can upload media you want to share.
It seems you permanently declined storage permission. You can go to the app settings to grant it.
This app needs permission to send you notification updates.
It seems you permanently declined notification permission. You can go to the app settings to grant it.
